name: Purchase Resources
brief: Negotiate exchange rate then buy resources
description: Use the kingdom's treasury to acquire needed materials from trade partners. Roll to determine the exchange rate, then purchase any amount at that rate.

criticalSuccess.description: Establish 1:1 exchange rate (pay 1 gold per resource)

success.description: Establish 2:1 exchange rate (pay 2 gold per resource)

special: Choose a single resource type, then purchase any amount at the determined rate.
